Posts.EditableText: To turn off hyperlinks, go to your game object, select Room Descriptions and uncheck "Enable hyperlinks". To turn off the side panel, add this to your game start script: [code:3arpgt6t] request (Hide, "Panes")[/code:3arpgt6t] If there's anything I missed, ask!
Posts.HTML:
To turn off hyperlinks, go to your game object, select Room Descriptions and uncheck "Enable hyperlinks".

To turn off the side panel, add this to your game start script:

   request (Hide, "Panes")


If there's anything I missed, ask!
